## Describe the documentation issue or improvement
A clear and concise description of the documentation issue or the improvement you would like to see.

## Motivation
Why is this documentation issue or improvement important? How does it affect your understanding or use of the project?

## Proposed changes
Describe the changes you would suggest for the documentation. Include any specific sections, examples, or explanations that should be added or modified.

## Additional context
Add any other context or screenshots about the documentation issue or improvement here.
